Resolves minor stability issue. 

4.3.2
Made sharing GasBuddy easier than ever before with a new card on the home screen. Refer your friends and help everyone save money on gas!
Added a brand new My Community card to our home screen to let you know how many users you helped every day with your price reports.

Introducing The Ribbon. A tool bar built into the station list that brings sort and filter options right to your finger tip. Try out any combination of Brand and Amenity filtering to help create The Perfect Pit Stop.
Introducing Price Range. When possible the Price Range card will display the range of fuel cost in your area.

Pay with GasBuddy is the first-of-its-kind gasoline savings program giving U.S. drivers a discount on virtually every gallon of gas they buy. The program is free to join and gives drivers 15 cents per gallon off their first purchase and a minimum of 5 cents off every subsequent fuel purchase. Pay with GasBuddy works at stations nationwide, is completely secure and no credit card application is required. Sign up today and start saving!

PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT. This app update provides gas and power availability tracking for areas impacted by Hurricane Harvey. Users who need to refuel cars, boats and jet skis to aid rescue operations can easily search for stations that have power and fuel. We ask that if you encounter a station with no fuel or no power, please edit the information in the app to assist others who are searching for gas.

Greetings GasBuddies! We got a couple of great fixes for you today.
The GasBuddy Logo on the splash screen would shrink after it initially appears. No, your eyes were not playing tricks on you, it was us, our bad.
Fixed a crash, that sometimes happened scrolling too vigorously on the Home Screen. Now you can scroll around to your hearts content.
We had some problems with the brand images. Sometimes they wouldn't load, sometimes they would crash, it was all very confusing. We got those images much more stable now!
Made the recalls text fit better on the smaller screen sizes.
Fixed some other crashes around the app. In general.

We renamed Trips to Drives so you can measure your fuel efficiency every time you drive, whether it’s a commute, school drop-off or a road trip. Other updates include fixing UI issues on the Home Screen, we smoothed out the Onboarding Screen for iPad users, and made some fixes to prevent the app from crashing.

We updated the app to support iOS 12. Other changes include updates to the Apple Watch app and Splash Screen. Now when you open your inbox, the unread notification will clear. You also have the ability to delete the station reviews you wish you’d never written (no worries - we’ve all been there). We fixed some crashes, too!

-Introducing our new Home Screen!  Same great information but we updated the design. (And we know. Change can be hard). As we roll out new features and ways to save you money, we want to ensure we have a user experience that is clean, uncluttered and easy to navigate. Take a tour and check it out!

Introducing GasBuddy Deal Alerts, a flash sale for every gas tank!  

GasBuddies can now save upwards of 25-cents per-gallon at the pump. By simply checking the GasBuddy app and using the Pay with GasBuddy card drivers can access deeper, dynamic discounts personalized to them.
